name: wit/add_to_playlist
desc: Add a song to a playlist.

name: wit/create_playlist
desc: Users can create a new playlist and add the current song to it.

name: wit/decrease_volume
desc: Decreases the volume of the selected media.

name: wit/dislike_music
desc: User can let the music service know they don't like this song.

name: wit/get_date
desc: User wants to know the date.

name: wit/get_time
desc: User wants to know the time.

name: wit/get_time_until_date
desc: User wants to know how many days till a certain date.

name: wit/get_timer
desc: Get how much time is left on the timer.

name: wit/get_track_info
desc: Get information about the current song playing.

name: wit/go_back
desc: Indicates that an action or individual should go back or be reversed.

name: wit/go_forward
desc: Indicates that an action or individual should move forward.

name: wit/increase_volume
desc: Increases the volume of the selected media.

name: wit/like_music
desc: Users can like a song and gets saved into the favorites.

name: wit/remove_from_playlist
desc: Deleting a song from the playlist.

name: wit/repeat_response
desc: The statement was unclear; please repeat the response.

name: wit/resume_music
desc: Resumes the song that was paused.

name: wit/shuffle_playlist
desc: Play the playlist in random order.

name: wit/stop_music
desc: Stop music or media content that's playing.

name: wit/unshuffle_playlist
desc: Plays according to the order in the playlist.
